meta.title: Play Fortnite | Xbox Cloud Gaming (Beta) on Xbox.com
meta.description: Play Fortnite with Xbox Cloud Gaming (Beta). New Chapter. New Island. New Battle Pass. In the fourth Chapter of Fortnite's Battle Royale, go forth in a new realm ‚Äî ride a dirt bike, roll in a snowball, launch yourself with the Shockwave Hammer, and hurdle over obstacles. Power yourself up with Reality Augments and claim territory for your squad, leaving behind Banners to declare what's yours. Play both Battle Royale and Fortnite Creative for free or purchase access to Fortnite‚Äôs PvE Campaign mode, Save the World.  All in-game purchases are discretionary, including the Save the World campaign, cosmetic items (e.g. Outfits), V-Bucks and seasonal account progression products like the Battle Pass. Download now and jump into the action.
